      • withShard

        public ReadBuilder withShard(int indexOfThisSubtask,
                             int numberOfParallelSubtasks)
        Description copied from interface: ReadBuilder
        Specify the shard to be read, and allocate sharded files to read records. Note that this method cannot be used simultaneously with ReadBuilder.withBucketFilter(Filter).

        Reason: Sharding and bucket filtering are different logical mechanisms for selecting subsets of table data. Applying both methods simultaneously introduces conflicting selection criteria.

        Specified by:
        withShard in interface ReadBuilder

      • withBucketFilter

        public ReadBuilder withBucketFilter(Filter<Integer> bucketFilter)
        Description copied from interface: ReadBuilder
        Push bucket filter. Note that this method cannot be used simultaneously with ReadBuilder.withShard(int, int).

        Reason: Bucket filtering and sharding are different logical mechanisms for selecting subsets of table data. Applying both methods simultaneously introduces conflicting selection criteria.

        Specified by:
        withBucketFilter in interface ReadBuilder
